errors.missing_permissions: You don't have permission to use this command.
errors.user_quarantined: You are not allowed to upload emojis.
errors.server_owner_only: You must be the server owner to use this command.

errors.missing_bot_permissions: I don't have permission to upload emojis. Please make sure I have the "Manage Guild Expressions" and "Create Guild Expressions" permissions.

currently_uploading.message: I'm currently uploading the pack **{packName}**. Please wait until it's finished.

errors.pack_failed: Failed uploading {index}. emoji. Skipping.. **{remainingSeconds} seconds** remaining.

upload.reason: Uploaded by @{username} ({userId}) from pack {packId}. {index} of / {total} emojis.

errors.same_invite_code: Invite code is the same as the current one.
errors.missing_bot_permissions: I don't have permission to send messages in that channel.
errors.panel_server_not_listed: You can't set a panel channel without listing your server. Visit [here]({link}) to list this server.
errors.role_is_managed: You can't add a managed role as a reward.
errors.role_is_higher: You can't add a role higher or equal to my highest role as a reward.
errors.invalid_votes: Required votes must be at least 1.
errors.reward_server_not_listed: You can't add a reward without listing your server. Visit [here]({link}) to list this server.
errors.max_rewards_reached: You can't have more than {count} rewards.
errors.reward_exists: There is already a reward with that role.

errors.missing_bot_permissions: I don't have permission to add roles to users.

reward.added: New vote reward added! I will give {role} to users who reach **{requiredVotes}** votes.

errors.no_rewards: There are no rewards in this server.

logging_messages.reward_added: New reward {role} added by {user}. The role will be given to users who reach **{requiredVotes}** votes.
